name: Meridian Environmental Technology
overview:
MET focuses on utilizing cutting-edge computer technology, scientific research, traveler information analysis, weather analysis, and forecasting systems to increase the productivity and decision-making capabilities of its customers primarily in the Transportation industry.

MET draws from extensive public and private data resources to convert raw weather and geographic data into information to meet the needs of a diverse customer base. It offers a unique range of customer-specific environmental and operational forecasting products and services. An internally developed system, named #SAFEâ„¢, is used as the model for the 511 National Guidelines, and currently delivers customized route-specific surface weather and road condition reports statewide across several states.
